content: this is such a sweet gender-neutral baby cardigan jacket sizes 0 - 3 months 3 - 6 months 6 - 9 months requirements dk yarn light worsted - less than 100g 300metres 4mm needles 3 small buttons knitted bottom-up - and very easy to knit there is also a matching baby beanie hat - and a blanket if you would like to make a little set **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
